titles.title: Expanding Proven Financing for American Employers Act
Expanding Proven Financing for American Employers Act
To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to provide specific credit risk retention requirements to certain qualifying collateralized loan obligations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
Expanding Proven Financing for American Employers Act
This bill revises risk-retention requirements applicable to certain asset-backed securities.
